titleInfo.title: The natural method of cureing the diseases of the body, and the disorders of the mind depending on the body
General reflections on the oeconomy of nature in animal life
Means and methods for preserving life and faculties; and also concerning the nature and cephalic disorders
Reflections on the nature and cure of particular chronical distempers

mods.note: In three parts : I. General reflections on the oeconomy of nature in animal life -- II. The means and methods for preserving life and faculties; and also concerning the nature and cure of acute contagions and cephalic disorders -- III. Reflections on the nature and cure of particular chronical distempers.
ASC: from the Yolton Library Rare Book Collection.
